metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3810 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in moodle versions 3.6 to 3.6.1, 3.5 to 3.5.3, 3.4 to 3.4.6, 3.1 to 3.1.15 and earlier unsupported versions. The /userpix/ page did not escape users' full names, which are included as text when hovering over profile images. Note this page is not linked to by default and its access is restricted.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
